Matt, Jim,
There was an 8 volume Natsuo set in last June's sale at Christie's estimated
at �1000-1500, it didn't sell. It is basically text with the illustrations
spread throughout the set, there was however a single volume of all the
illustrations published separately, this is the one to get if you can find
it.
Alan
----- Original Message -----
From: "Jim Gilbert" <jggilbert@...>
To: <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 13, 2004 1:31 AM
Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] tsuba designs?


: I don't remember Matt.  My impression is that it was a lot more than one
would normally expect 8 big, glossy, expensive Japanese fittings books to
be.  Thinking about it I can picture a fittings museum book shelf price card
of Y960,000 or 690,000, but I wouldn't bet on it.  Maybe Alan or Craig knows
what they go for these days.  The fittings museum was offering some
significant discounts for cash book purchases toward the end.
:
: Jim
:
:
:
:   How much was it ....... out of interest?
:
:   - Matt
